top_positive_factors.explanation: Interacciones y calidad de relación con el cliente
Tasa de éxito histórica con el cliente

top_negative_factors.explanation: Product B Sold In The Past
Peso de ventas históricas de Product A
Número de interacciones con el cliente

next_steps.step: Address the concern of 'product_B_sold_in_the_past' by highlighting the benefits of our new offering and demonstrating how it overcomes any previous limitations or issues experienced with the old product.

Mitigate the 'product_A_ratio' concern by emphasizing the overall value proposition of our complete solution, showcasing the superior performance and return on investment compared to solely focusing on product A.

Proactively address the 'competitor_Z' threat by leveraging our existing customer engagement in Iberia to reinforce our strong local presence and highlight successful case studies demonstrating our competitive advantage.
